scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:cjs && yarn build:umd
scripts.geth:start: npm run geth:stop 2&>/dev/null && docker run -td -p 8546:8546 ethereum/client-go --shh --ws --wsaddr 0.0.0.0 --wsorigins '*' --wsapi=web3,shh,net --testnet --nodiscover --maxpeers 0 && sleep 2
scripts.geth:stop: docker stop $(docker ps | grep ethereum/client-go | sed 's/ .*//') || true
scripts.nats:start: npm run nats:stop 2&>/dev/null && docker run -td -p 4221:4221 -p 4222:4222 provide/nats-server -p 4222 -DV && sleep 2
scripts.nats:stop: docker stop $(docker ps | grep provide/nats-server | sed 's/ .*//') || true
scripts.test: npm run test:startup && $(./node_modules/.bin/jest --verbose --color --passWithNoTests || npm run test:teardown) || npm run test:teardown
scripts.test:startup: npm run nats:start && npm run geth:start
scripts.test:teardown: npm run nats:stop && npm run geth:stop
